professional_summary: Experienced IT Security Compliance Analyst with expertise in ISO27001 implementation, FedRAMP compliance, and managing security policies across various platforms including Azure, G-Suite, and OKTA.

key_responsibilities: Managing ISO27001 implementation across the organization.
Leading ISO27001 Gap Analysis across business units and teams.
Contributing as a SME to ISO27001 controls implementation.
Controlling access permissions and privileges of users.
and testing backup and recovery plans.
Ensuring storage and archiving procedures follow defined SOPs.
Managing and planning IT projects related to systems.
Monitoring storage capabilities of the system.
Managing IT support and resolving technical issues.
Ensuring smooth operation of IT infrastructure.
